title: ImageXORDrawingMode
name: ImageXORDrawingMode
description: Sets the paint mode of the image to alternate between the image's current color and the new specified color.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: color
arguments.description:
the color (The default value is "black"):
- Hexadecimal value of RGB color. For example, specify the color white as ##FFFFFF or FFFFFF.
- String value of color (for example, "black", "red", "green").
- List of three numbers for (R,G,B) values. Each value must be in the range 0-255.
